post.author: ve3
post.body:
Hi, please can you take a look at my weblink here;
http://velas.wetpaint.com/page/my+projects

basically i need someone to help me create 3d model assets for somebody's project. It must be within a company that creates professional game projects

Please let me know whether there are any vacancies within this area!

Thanks,
Velas
